desc: Flourished Sensations is a Black owned company offering a well-curated range of sophisticated home fragrances made for all who love to feel really good, especially at home. Shop scented candles, wax melts, wax warmers, sage and more. Our goal is to provide quality products that evoke a sense of peace in your home.
